ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | symgga.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` X ) |
| 2 |  | symgga.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_symgtset | |- ( X e. V -> ( Xt_ ` ( X X. { ~P X } ) ) = ( TopSet ` G ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( X e. V -> ( ( Xt_ ` ( X X. { ~P X } ) ) |`t B ) = ( ( TopSet ` G ) |`t B ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopSet ` G ) = ( TopSet ` G ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_topnval | |- ( ( TopSet ` G ) |`t B ) = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( X e. V -> ( ( Xt_ ` ( X X. { ~P X } ) ) |`t B ) = ( TopOpen ` G ) ) |
